channel.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast
channel.description:
The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast is for any woman 18 to 118 and from anywhere in the world. Come learn how to keep the passion alive in your relationship. Whether you have never tried anything to spice up your love life, or are a seasoned 'playful' woman - this podcast is sure to give you some ideas.
Darlene, The Party Lady, (You can visit her here),is a Passion Parties Consultant and retired registered nurse. Renea is a stay at home/work from home mom and former night club manager. Together they will tastefully and educationally talk about all kinds of passion products, sex toys or massagers, and fun sex tips to keep your relationship hot!
The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast is sponsored by Passion Parties by Darlene The Party Lady, and Produced by Voice by Hawk Productions. Passion Parties is very proud of its sassy but still classy image. Passion Parties does not sell, endorse or engage in any type of pornography.
The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast is for informational use only. We don't diagnose or treat any kind of medical conditions.
While the PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast is educational for women, we ask that our listeners be the age of 18 or older, as the topics discussed are adult in nature. If you'd like to be emailed whenever we update our show, just subscribe by entering your information into our Address Book!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Don't be shy! Give it a listen! Sponsored by Passion Parties by Darlene "The Party Lady"!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 260 - Dating After a Breakup: Part 2
item.description: On today's show Darlene talks about getting back into the dating scene after a breakup. From what to wear, to what to talk about, Darlene has lots of tips for making sure you're not setting yourself up for dating disaster! As always, Darlene has three fun Sex Tips trivia facts for you, and we have a hot'n'silly Sex Game for you and your partner to try this week. And Darlene answers the Question of the Week, which asks about how much sex is normal. Thanks so much for listening, and we'll see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 259 - Dating After a Breakup : Part 1
item.description: On today's show Darlene talks about getting back into the dating scene after a breakup. From getting over the angry words said during the final moments of a relationship, to getting over the pain and heartache, and resisting the urge to jump into the arms, or bed, of the first person who catches your eye. As always, Darlene has three fun Sex Tips trivia facts for you, and we have a fun Xex Game for you and your partner to try this week. Darlene has an answer for the Question of the Week, which asks about uneven breasts. Thanks so much for listening, and we'll see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 258 - Overcoming Sexual Anxiety
item.description: On today's show, Darlene shares an article by Denise Charles about overcoming sexual anxiety. Through the different stages of a relationship or marriage there can be many causes of sexual anxiety and reasons both males and females might be avoiding sexual contact. The article explains how the anxiety can be overcome, and shares tips for communication and keeping the relationship alive. As always, Darlene shares three fun Sex Tips trivia facts with you. We also have a slippery wet Sex Game for you and your lover to play this week. Thanks so much for listening, and we will see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 257 - Fidelity, 5 Myths About Cheating
item.description: On today's show, Darlene shares and article titled, "Fidelity, 5 myths about cheating" by Eric Anderson which was published in the Washington Post. After hearing this topic come up many times by both customers and fellow consultants, Darlene thought this article provided wonderful food for thought on the subject of infidelity. From why men and women cheat, to what defines cheating in this technological age, and even some history of cheating, the article shares interesting studies and viewpoints. As always, Darlene shares three fun Sex Tip trivia facts with you today, and we have a steamy Finish the Fantasy Sex Game for you and your lover to play out this week! Darlene also answers a compilation of questions in this week's Question of the Week. Thanks so much for listening and have a wonderful week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 256 - The Mysteries of Love
item.description: On today's show, Darlene shares an article by Sara Reistad-Long called, "Ten things to know about love and romance, from why we fall hard to why we cheat." The article explains what rules attraction, and what biological systems affect our love life. The article shares some very fascinating information about hormones and thought processes, and their effects on how, and who, we love! As always, Darlene shares three fun Sex Tips trivia facts with you today. We also have an easy and fun Sex Game for you and your lover to give a try this week. Darlene shares a very funny play on names instead of a Question of the Week this week. We hope you had a wonderful Valentine's Day, and don't forget to celebrate your partner every day, not just February 14th. Thanks for listening!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 255 - Oh No! It's Valentine's Day!
item.description: Oh no! Are you scrambling for last minute ideas for your special lady (or man) tonight? Darlene has a bunch of ideas for how to celebrate Valentine's Day. And you don't have to only celebrate today, you can make it Valentine's Week, or Valentine's Month...or how about all year round?! Darlene has tips on making your gift special, and if you are really late on getting your special girl a gift, she even has a way for you to print your own Valentine gift right from her Facebook fan page at http://www.thepartylady.net! As always, Darlene has three fun Sex Tips trivia facts for you this week. And we have a steamy hot Sex Game for you and your lover to play this Valentine's week! And instead of answering the Question of the Week, Darlene shares a list of romantic horror movies you and your lover can watch together! Now that's a different way to celebrate! Thanks so much for listening and remember to celebrate your love every day!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 254 - Hot Sex Over 60?!
item.description: On today's show Darlene talks about the myth and misconception that you'll lose your desire for sex and intimacy as you age. Darlene explains why you don't have to put love making on the back burner just because you are a little older. There are many options and solutions to common problems that may arise with aging, and Darlene explains them all! As always, Darlene shares three fun Sex Tips trivia facts with you, and we have another fun Sex Game for you and your lover to play this week. Darlene also answers the Question of the Week which comes from a Passion Parties consultant about pheromones. Thanks so much for listening and we'll see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 252 - Suddenly Single? Stop Singing the Blues!
item.description: On today's show Darlene has a list of things to Do and Don't after a relationship split. She also has great tips and suggestions for how to get back into the dating scene. Don't hide away, but don't go into an all-out-party-mode either! Self-evaluation is necessary, but don't dwell on things. Push forward gradually and see where the future leads you. The advice Darlene shares with you today can be valuable whether you just ended a marriage, or have been single for too long and want to find your partner. As always, Darlene has three fun Sex Tips trivia facts for you today. We also have a silly Sex Game for you and your partner to play this week, it's sure to get you both laughing! And Darlene answers the Question of the Week this week, which deals with the unintended effects of an orgasm. Thanks so much for listening and we hope to see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 251 - We're Soulmates, so Why is the Sex So Bad?!
item.description: On today's show, Darlene shares two articles with you about why you and your soulmate might not be the best love making partners. You may have been best friends for years, but when that time comes to hook up, yikes!, maybe things just don't live up to your expectations. You'll find out today why that just may be the case. As always, Darlene has three fun Sex Tip trivia facts for you today. We also have a fun Sex Game to challenge you and your partner. And instead of a Question of the Week, Darlene shares some fun horoscope sign information that might help you find your perfect match, and stay away from a doomed pairing. Thanks so much for listening and we hope to see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 250 - Impotence and Options
item.description: On today's show Darlene explains the possible causes of male impotence and erectile dysfunction. Medical, psychological, and many combinations of each can cause problems achieving or maintaining an erection during sexual activity. But there are many solutions and treatments for each, and Darlene explains the many possibilities. As always, Darlene shares three fun Sex Tip trivia facts with you. We also have a very interesting Sex Game for you and your lover to play, not only this week, but maybe as an ongoing challenge! Darlene also answers the Question of the Week, which comes from a customer. Thanks so much for listening and we'll see you next week!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 225 - Penis, More Penis, and a Penis Workout!
item.description: Today's show is all about the Penis! Darlene shares Dr. Ava Cadell's Penis Workout - just like any other part of our body, a man's penis can lose some of it's get-up-and-go as we age. Dr. Cadell's Penis Workout will help bring back some of your (or your man's) penis' youth. So grab your sweatband and tube socks and start your penis workout today! We hope you are enjoying the summer - and with the heat wave hitting most of the country right now, we hope you're finding some fun steamy ways to have fun indoors! Keep cool!

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 51 - Sex Toys for Passion!
item.description:
We've changed things up a bit here at the PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast!
<center>Get ready for some NEW features!</center>
This week Darlene explains the differences between Vibrators and Dildos. You'll learn about the many types of each, and which ones may be right for you!
As always, we have our Sex Tips and the Question of the Week as well.
<center>Now onto the new stuff!</center>
Since we've heard all the Sensual Zodiacs, this week we have an introduction to Celtic Tree Signs - which we'll have sprinkled throughout this year's podcasts.
AND....
Welcome to Cooking with the PartyGirls! That's right, we have a special treat for you and your lover cooking up in the kitchen - and we'll share with you how to make it!
This week is 'Heart Dips Duos' - it makes 32 cookies
Here are the ingredients: 3 tablespoons sugar (white or red) (8-ounce) can refrigerated crescent rolls 1/2 tsp cinnamon 2 tablespoons butter, melted 8 ounces melted semi-sweet chocolate 1 package fresh strawberries
And how to prepare: Sprinkle 2 Tablespoons of sugar on a cutting board. Unroll crescent roll dough, separate into 4 rectangles, Place rectangles on top of the sugared board, Seal the center of each rectangle together press dough into the sugar. Brush the top of the rectangles with half of the melted butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon and remaining sugar.
From the long side, roll one rectangle jelly-roll fashion up to the center of the dough. Then roll the opposite side to meet the first roll in the center. This will create heart shaped logs. Wrap all 4 logs in plastic wrap and refrigerate about 30 minutes to firm up.
Preheat oven to 375 F. Line baking sheets with parchment or silicone sheets for best results.
Remove dough from fridge, unwrap and place on cutting board. Slice each roll into 8 pieces place about 2 inches apart on baking tray. Press down to 1/2-inch thickness and pinch the bottom of each slice to a point to form a heart shape. Brush with remaining melted butter.
Bake 9 to 13 minutes until golden. Reshape if necessary and let cool.
Melt chocolate, stirring until smooth. Dip crescents halfway into chocolate and place waxed paper Refrigerate to harden.
Dip fresh strawberries halfway into chocolate and place on waxed paper Refrigerate to harden
Alternate feeding the Chocolate Duo dips to your love, with a glass of wine or tea for a wonderful sexy treat

item.title: The PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast - Episode 21 Ben Wa and Kegels
item.description:
We have a information packed episode for you today!

First, Darlene explains Ben-Wa balls. What are ben-wa balls? How can ben-wa balls help you practice your kegel exercises? How do ben-wa balls help increase your sexual pleasure? They are amazing little things, and we all know how important doing your kegels are! What, you don't? Then you better listen! Kegels help strengthen your pelvic floor muscles - decreasing incontinence, increasing sexual pleasure, and even helping before and after you have a baby!

Darlene gives you a step by step Kegel workout routine to help you get started, and tips to find time to do your Kegels and use your Ben-Wa balls!

As always, we have our sex tips, question of the week, and sensual zodiac. This is the last week in the Sensual Zodiac for Leo - a plan for a hot night with your sensual leo man, and you won't want to miss the last sex tip - Darlene explains how to finally find a bra that fits!! Amazing tips and suggestions to measuring and finding the right bra for you.

We want to thank all of you for listening, visit us on iTunes and leave a review if you'd like :-) We love to hear what you all think of the PartyGirl PartyGirl Podcast! And thank you to those listeners sending in your questions for the Question of the Week! Keep them coming!
